description: Advanced Leadership in an Orchestral Context (ALOC) is designed for students who would like to expand the skills set demonstrated in LSOC, with continued focus on the following learning outcomes: 1) artistic leadership in large ensemble and sectional rehearsals 2) administration of their respective sections via leadership activities such as parts assignments, section rotation, string bowings (and other ensemble-related adminsistrative oversight), through consultation with ensemble faculty (and other titled players within their respective sections) 3) a self-reflection component via a) an e-journal and b) interview(s) with ensemble faculty members evidencing contemplation of best-practices for orchestral leadership.
title: Advanced Leadership in an Orchestral Context
